extendedInfo.description: Roll over writer's block with Writer's Dice!Writer's Dice are for writers, storytellers and gamers! These dice have six words packed with meaning: BUT, SO, AND, AS, OR, IF. Use them to plot your next novel! Roll them into your role-playing games! Gift them to your gaming buddies! Plus, they have regular 1-6 pips so you can use them as normal dice, too.
